title: Who's in charge? (TEFC)
creator_credit: Michael Darlow, Robert Reid and Video Arts
brief_description: Demonstrates some of the challenges and problems that Mike Hammett, the new despatch supervisor encounters in his first days on the job. At first Mike receives no help from his immediate boss who should help and support him.
creator_credit_for_label: Michael Darlow, Robert Reid and Video Arts
